---
category: news
title: "DeepMind ace joins Cambridge Quantum Computing"
excerpt: "Cambridge Quantum Computing has secured a major coup by hiring DeepMind’s Professor Stephen Clark as head of Artificial Intelligence. At DeepMind – the UK AI subsidiary of Alphabet Inc – Professor Clark was a senior staff research scientist and led a team working on grounded language learning in virtual environments."
